Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesThe candidate will join the front office development team working for APAC Markets businessRole Summary:This position is a hands-on Python / SQL software developer role, candidate needs to have exposure to electronic trading business, proficient in python and experience building systems for data processingRole Responsibility:- Build and maintain infrastructure for data retrieval, processing and storage- Build strong working relationships with the teams in SG and HK- Be willing and able to adapt to changes in priorities- Ability to learn and apply new technologies to deliver added business value- Maintain a strong focus on qualityAdditional InformationRequired Skills:- Proficient in Python / SQL- Good understanding of data base management systems- Experience developing and maintaining systems that handle large amounts of data- Understanding of Electronic Trading Systems- Attention to detail and code quality- Excellent problem solving and analytical skills in a high-pressure environment- Strong communication skills and an ability to convey ideas and concepts with clarityRequirementsExperience :- 5 to 10 YearsNotice period: Immediate to 30 daysRequired QualificationGraduation - Bachelor of Engineering - Bachelor of Technology (B.E./B.Tech.)in Other - Not Required Per/CGPAJob InsightsVirtual On-boarding Possible.Don't source Outstation CandidatesImmediate Requirement Need candidates who can join within a month. (Don't source long notice periods)Mandatory: Excellent communication skills (Rating of 4 out of 5) is required for this role.Recruitment Stages- 1) CV Shortlisting 2) Telephonic Round 3) Interview with Hiring Manager
